original_title: UFC on ESPN 42: Thompson vs. Holland
overview: UFC on ESPN 42: Thompson vs. Holland was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on December 3, 2022, at Amway Center in Orlando, Florida, United States. A welterweight bout between former UFC Welterweight Championship challenger Stephen Thompson and Kevin Holland headlined the event.
title: UFC on ESPN 42: Thompson vs. Holland
